languages.text: Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика Ирлиэт наблюдает, как боевые снаряды разрывают корпус крохотного судна. Сколь же жестоки мон-кай. Обладая властью над чужими судьбами, они легко даруют надежду на спасение... А затем в одночасье отнимают ее вместе с чужой жизнью.

traits.locale_text: Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика Ирлиэт наблюдает, как боевые снаряды разрывают корпус крохотного судна. Никто не в праве безнаказанно творить преступления, но куда более жестоки мон-кай. В погоне за праведностью они легко даруют надежду на спасение, а затем в одночасье отнимают ее вместе с чужой жизнью — сухо заключает эльдарка.

languages.text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.
languages.original_text: Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика Ирлиэт наблюдает, как боевые снаряды разрывают корпус крохотного судна. Сколь же жестоки мон-кай. Обладая властью над чужими судьбами, они легко даруют надежду на спасение... А затем в одночасье отнимают ее вместе с чужой жизнью.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the missiles tear the tiny vessel apart. 'No crime should go unpunished, but mon-keigh thrive in their cruelty. They offer hope for salvation and take it away in an instant along with the lives of others, all in the name of righteousness', the Aeldari grimly concludes.

Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

languages.text: À travers les vitraux de la passerelle, Yrliet regarde les tirs mettre en pièces le petit vaisseau, en s'interrogeant sur la cruauté des mon-keigh. Quand le sort d'autrui est entre leurs mains, ils n'accordent qu'un mince espoir de salut, qui disparaît rapidement tandis qu'ils prennent la vie de leur victime.
languages.original_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

traits.locale_text: À travers les vitraux de la passerelle, Yrliet regarde les tirs mettre en pièces le petit vaisseau, en s'interrogeant sur la cruauté des mon-keigh. Quand le sort d'autrui est entre leurs mains, ils n'accordent qu'un mince espoir de salut, qui disparaît rapidement tandis qu'ils prennent la vie de leur victime.

languages.text: ユリエットは船長のブリッジのステンドグラス越しに、砲弾が小さな船を引き裂くのを眺めながら、モン＝ケイの残酷さに思いを巡らせる。他人の運命を握るとき、彼らはそっと救いの希望を与える…そして突然、犠牲者の命とともにそれを奪い去るのだ。
languages.original_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは船長のブリッジのステンドグラス越しに、砲弾が小さな船を引き裂くのを眺めながら、モン＝ケイの残酷さに思いを巡らせる。他人の運命を握るとき、彼らはそっと救いの希望を与える…そして突然、犠牲者の命とともにそれを奪い去るのだ。

languages.text: 伊莉耶特透过舰桥处的彩色玻璃窗，亲眼看着炮弹将那艘小船撕成碎片，思考着猴子的残酷天性。当猴子有权决定他人的命运时，他们会轻易承诺他人救赎的希望……但在这之后，却会突然撕毁承诺，并将受害者的性命一起夺走。
languages.original_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特透过舰桥处的彩色玻璃窗，亲眼看着炮弹将那艘小船撕成碎片，思考着猴子的残酷天性。当猴子有权决定他人的命运时，他们会轻易承诺他人救赎的希望……但在这之后，却会突然撕毁承诺，并将受害者的性命一起夺走。

languages.text: Yrliet mira a través de las vidrieras del puente del capitán, observando cómo los disparos destrozan el diminuto navío, reflexionando sobre la crueldad de los mon-keigh. Cuando tienen el destino de otro en sus manos, conceden la esperanza de salvación a la ligera... hasta que de repente se la arrebatan junto con la vida de su víctima.
languages.original_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet mira a través de las vidrieras del puente del capitán, observando cómo los disparos destrozan el diminuto navío, reflexionando sobre la crueldad de los mon-keigh. Cuando tienen el destino de otro en sus manos, conceden la esperanza de salvación a la ligera... hasta que de repente se la arrebatan junto con la vida de su víctima.

languages.text: Yrliet sieht durch die Buntglasfenster der Brücke und zu, wie die Schüsse das winzige Schiff zerreißen. Sie denkt über die Grausamkeit der Chem-Pan-Sey nach. Wenn sie das Schicksal eines anderen in Händen halten, gewähren sie bereitwillig die Hoffnung auf Erlösung ... nur um sie dem Opfer dann ganz plötzlich wieder zu entreißen, zusammen mit seinem Leben.
languages.original_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet sieht durch die Buntglasfenster der Brücke und zu, wie die Schüsse das winzige Schiff zerreißen. Sie denkt über die Grausamkeit der Chem-Pan-Sey nach. Wenn sie das Schicksal eines anderen in Händen halten, gewähren sie bereitwillig die Hoffnung auf Erlösung ... nur um sie dem Opfer dann ganz plötzlich wieder zu entreißen, zusammen mit seinem Leben.

languages.text: Yrliet, kaptan köprüsündeki vitraylardan atışların küçük gemiyi parçalara ayırışını izliyor ve mon-keighlerin acımasızlığını düşünüyor. Başkasının kaderini ellerinde tuttuklarında, kurtuluş umudunu hafifçe sunuyorlar... Sonra aniden bu umutla birlikte kurbanlarının canlarını çekip alıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Yrliet looks through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, watching the shots tear the tiny vessel apart, pondering the cruelty of the mon-keigh. When they hold another's fate in their grasp, they grant the hope of salvation lightly... until suddenly snatching it away along with their victim's life.
